fields.name: Enchantment: Devourer
fields.description: +50% Attack Speed +30 Magic Damage on Hit Passive - Devouring Spirit: Takedowns on large monsters and Champions increase the magic damage of this item by +1. Takedowns on Rift Scuttlers increase the magic damage of this item by +2. Takedowns on epic monsters increase the magic damage of this item by +5. At 30 Stacks, your Devourer becomes Sated, granting extra on Hit effects.
